name: PyMOL
description: Python-enhanced molecular graphics tool.

name: Jmol
description: Browser-based HTML5 viewer and stand-alone Java viewer for chemical structures in 3D.

name: VMD
description: Molecular visualization program for displaying, animating, and analyzing large biomolecular systems using 3-D graphics and built-in scripting.

name: Chimera
description: Highly extensible program for interactive molecular visualization and analysis. Source is available.

name: ChimeraX
description: The next-generation molecular visualization program, following UCSF Chimera. Source is available here.

name: DataWarrior
description: A program for data Visualization and analysis which combines dynamic graphical views and interactive row filtering with chemical intelligence.

name: Open Babel
description: Chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of chemical data.

name: MayaChemTools
description: Collection of Perl and Python scripts, modules, and classes that support day-to-day computational discovery needs.

name: Packmol
description: Initial configurations for molecular dynamics simulations by packing optimization.

name: AutoDock Vina
description: Molecular docking and virtual screening.

name: smina
description: Customized AutoDock Vina to better support scoring function development and high-performance energy minimization.

name: myChEMBL

name: RDKit
description: Collection of cheminformatics and machine-learning software written in C++ and Python.

name: Indigo
description: Universal molecular toolkit that can be used for molecular fingerprinting, substructure search, and molecular visualization written in C++ package, with Java, C#, and Python wrappers.

name: CDK (Chemistry Development Kit)
description: Algorithms for structural chemo- and bioinformatics, implemented in Java.

name: ChemmineR

name: ChemPy
description: A Python package useful for chemistry (mainly physical/inorganic/analytical chemistry)

name: MolecularGraph.jl
description: A graph-based molecule modeling and chemoinformatics analysis toolkit fully implemented in Julia

name: datamol:
description: Molecular Manipulation Made Easy. A light wrapper build on top of RDKit.

name: CGRtools

description: Tool designed to provide a simple way of standardising molecules as a prelude to e.g. molecular modelling exercises.

name: MolVS

name: rd_filters
description: A script to run structural alerts using the RDKit and ChEMBL

name: pdb-tools
description: A swiss army knife for manipulating and editing PDB files.

description: Front-end JavaScript library for providing the ability to represent, draw, edit, compare and search molecule structures on web browsers.

name: 3Dmol.js
description: An object-oriented, webGL based JavaScript library for online molecular visualization.

name: JChemPaint
description: Chemical 2D structure editor application/applet based on the Chemistry Development Kit.

name: rdeditor
description: Simple RDKit molecule editor GUI using PySide.

name: nglviewer
description: Interactive molecular graphics for Jupyter notebooks.

name: DescriptaStorus

name: mol2vec
description: Vector representations of molecular substructures.

name: Align-it

name: Rcpi

name: DeepChem
description: Deep learning library for Chemistry based on Tensorflow

name: ChemML

name: olorenchemengine
description: Molecular property prediction with unified API for diverse models and respresentations,

name: OpenChem

name: Summit

description: Chemical Information from the Web.

name: ChemSpiPy

name: razi
